How to Buy Bitcoins with Skrill

The companies below let you buy bitcoin with Skrill.

Coinimal Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoins with Skrill online in under 10 seconds. Available for European users.

Buy Bitcoin

VirWoX Buy Bitcoin

One of the few ways to buy bitcoins with PayPal or Skrill. Buy Second Life Lindens, and trade them for bitcoin.

Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoins with Skrill online from other users. LocalBitcoins is used as escrow.

Buy Bitcoin

The list below contains the same companies listed above, but with more information about fees, countries supported, and many more additional details.

Coinimal Buy Bitcoin

Coinimal is a bitcoin exchange based in Austria. Among many payment methods accepted, customers can buy bitcoins with Skrill in under 10 seconds.

Buy Bitcoin

VirWoX Buy Bitcoin

VirWoX isn't a Bitcoin exchange, but rather used to acquire Second Life Lindens (SLL), a currency used in the virtual world Second Life. It is, however, possible to buy SLL with Skrill, and then trade the SLL for bitcoin. We don't have a step-by-step tutorial for how to go through the process with Skrill, but it's very similar to how it's done with PayPal. Simply deposit with Skrill, buy SLL, and trade the SLL for BTC. You can follow the steps shown in the PayPal article for an approximate how-to.

Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

LocalBitcoins is an escrow service and will help connect you with users online who accept Skrill for bitcoin. Use caution when trading on LocalBitcoins. Check each seller's profile to verify a history of succesful trades. Trader's with negative feedback and problematic trading history should be avoided.

Buy Bitcoin

Other payment options for Europeans include SEPA transfer, credit card, or cash. Or, check out more payment methods.
